annotations:
FROM:SINOGRAND SHIPPING
TO:BROKERS/CHARTERERS/OWNERS
DEAR VALUABLE CUSTOMERS,
PLEASE FIND BELOW POSITION AND GLAD TO HEAR ANY SUITABLE BUSINESS FOR ANY DIRECTION,
MV SUNNY ROUTE                                                                              OPEN KAMSAR END OF AUG,TRY ANY
MPP COMBINE TO 60MT
PANAMA FLAG,KR CLASS，2006BLT.
DWT/GRT/NRT  13,567.44/9,090/4,550MT.ON SUMMER DRAFT 9.03MTRS.
G/B CAPA 19,886.21/18,918.04,
LOA /LBP/BM/DM  128.61 M/120.00M / 20 / 13.60,
TWN DECK.STL BOTTOM.
2 CRANE30.70Tx2Sets;     2     DERRIC 26.00 T x 2Sets,
P.N.I COVERED.CLASS COVERED
CARGO HATCH   :
A).UPPER DECK TYPE:  SINGLE PULL  HATCH SIZE :  NO. 1    32.25  X  13.50 M    /     NO. 2.   32.25  X  13.50 M
B). 2ND DECK TYPE: PONTOON TYPE NONTIGHT STEEL HATCH COVER HATCH SIZE : NO.1  25.5MX14.5M/ 6.75 M X10.5M     NO.2.     3M X 10.5M /29.25MX14.5M
MV PORTIA                                                                                        OPEN BALTIC EARLY OCT,TRY ANY,CAN USE NSR
PNMX BC GLESS BLT 2004 DWAT ABT 73,624.25 MTS ON ABT 14.0165 M SSW
PANAMA FLAG   GT/NT 40,160/25,869 LOA/BEAM 225/32.26 TPC 66.53 MTS
GRAIN 3,200,365.13  CUFT  7/7 HO/HA
GRAIN BREAKDOWN 398,394/483,045/466,528/465,332/466,716/466,295/454,051
HATCH DIMS NO: 15.48 X 13.20 M, NOS: 2-7 15.48 X 15.00 M  COVERS STEEL SIDE ROLLING
CLASS NKK - VSL IS AHL FITTED / STRENGTHENED FOR HEAVY CARGOES
HOLDS 2/4/6 MAY BE LEFT EMPTY.
BUNKER AND CONSUMPTION:
BALLAST:  ECO SPD 12.00 KNOTS ON ABT 22 MTS IFO PLUS 0.2 MTS LSMGO.
LADDEN: ECO SPD 11.50 KNOTS ON ABT 23 MTS IFO PLUS 0.2 LSMGO.
IN PORT 3.0 MT IFO PLUS 0.2 MTS LSMGO IDLE
AND 3.5MT IFO PLUS 0.2 MTS LSMGO BLL/DEBLL/EXCHANGING BALLAST.
ALL DETAILS "ABOUT"
BREAKBULK LINE FROM FAREAST TO BALTIC AND ENROUTE:
MV.P.T
73KDWT GLESS,
LOADING:SHANGHAI                  15-30TH AUG 2024
DISCHARING PORT:SAINT PETERSBURG,RUSSIA
WILL GO VIA NSR
MV.S.R
24KDWT SDBC
CRANE 25MT
LOADING:QINGDAO                  10-20TH SEP
SHANGHAI                15-25TH SEP
DISCHARGGING PORT:SAINT PETERSBURG,RUSSIA
GO VIA SUEZ
MV.S.F
17KDWT MPP
COMBINE TO 55MT
LOADING:TIANJIN                 25-30TH AUG 2024
SHANGHAI             1-10TH SEP    2024
DISCHARING PORT:ARZEW--------SAINT PETERSBURG,RUSSIA
MV.S.W
22KDWT MPP
COMBINE TO 90MT
LOADING:QINGDAO                    10-20TH SEP 2024
SHANGHAI                   20-30TH SEP 2024
DISCHARING PORT:SAINT PETERSBURG,RUSSIA
COLLECTING ANY SUITABLE CARGO ENROUTE
GLALD TO HEAR.
THANKS AND B.REGARDS
